text: The VinFast Fadil is a City car made by VinFast from 2019 to 2022. == History and Features == The VinFast Fadil was launched in 2019 its a rebadged Opel Karl as part of a agreement between VinFast and General Motors it has a Crossover design (since it was rebadged from the Opel Karl Rocks version) and has only a 1.4 liter petrol engine with only a transmission option which is a CVT transmission. == Markets == The VinFast Fadil was sold mainly in The Vietnamese market during its production and became the best-selling car in Vietnam in 2021. == Discontinuation == The production of The VinFast Fadil ended in 2022 without a sucessor mainly due to Vinfast's focus on electric vehicles. == References == Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles
title: VinFast Fadil
